resources.string: To start reading a book with sight words highlighted touch the book cover. \n\n The Dolch sight word list is available in the Public Domain. The full set of Dolch Sight Words is \'highlighted\' in this Reader. The Dolch Sight Word list divides it\'s words into Pre-primer, Primer, Grades 1, 2 and 3 and Nouns. They are all highlighted in the same way for this prototype version of the Sight Words Reader.
